name: Joseph
text: There you are.

name: Joseph
text: So I will start introduce you how we can classify the material.

name: Joseph
text: As you can see, the bins are distribute into 5 types based on the dangerous each materials are.

name: Joseph
text: by the green one is organic, you can put every food waste into this bin.

name: Joseph
text: Next one, the blue bin is used to store plastic or whatever trash that can't re-use.

name: Joseph
text: Yellow is for recycle, you can toss up plastic can, or bottles in here.

name: Joseph
text: Red bin is where we put all the dangerous and chemical stuff into it.

name: Joseph
text: You have to be careful on this kind of trash, OK?

name: Joseph
text: You don't want yourself to be burn or cut.

name: Joseph
text: Finally the last bin, the orange is where you must have the most caution.

name: Joseph
text: This is where the infected trash full of virus belong to.

name: Joseph
text: You need to read how to toss the trash correctly.

name: Joseph
text: Or else, you may got yourself a fever or worst.

name: Joseph
text: Now try to sort it out yourself.

name: Joseph
text: Brilliant.

name: Joseph
text: As for the reward, since the government would be glad for your corporation.

name: Joseph
text: They will provide you with a supplies and money.

name: Joseph
text: That would be enough for you now.

name: Joseph
text: if you still want to continue helping us, then I would like you to accompany me to waste-sroting factory.

name: Student
text: Why we have to go waste-sorting factory?

name: Student
text: You know that I have a class to attend as well right?

name: Student
text: I don't think I have time for that sort of thing.

name: Joseph
text: How can you grow up to be this kind of kid huh?

name: Joseph
text: We need to tell them how to adapt into this situation.

name: Joseph
text: And what type of school would still on open at this situation.

name: Student
text: I don't have any choices huh.

name: Student
text: find! I'll go with you.
